author: Mohammed Iqbal
text:
The Delhi High Court on Tuesday dismissed a writ petition moved by a lawyer for a directive to the Delhi Police to enter the Jawaharlal Nehru University campus and arrest the students, against whom lookout notices have been issued.

Five students, including Umar Khalid and Anirban, accused of sedition for organising an event on the campus against the hanging of Parliament attack case convict Afzal Guru, returned to the university on Sunday night after remaining untraceable for several days.
title: Plea for directive to police dismissed
